Introduction

Marcus is a Filipino idol member of the global pop group, HORI7ON. He secured his spot in the group after ranking second in the survival show, Dream Maker.

Marcus made his film debut in the Philippines with “My 2 Mommies” in 2018. Following that, he joined “Team Yey!” and was part of an Asian touring company for the musical “The Lion King.” He was affiliated with ABS-CBN. He is cousins with Elisia of UNIS.
